Name: Black Rainbow
About the game: The burning arrows are falling all over your forest house! The evil behind the curtain is far bigger and dangerous than anyone could have ever imagined. It's up to adventurer Helen Stone to restore the balance in this hidden and unexplored world. All people and creatures of Amazon are in danger as the ancient evil is rising again after centuries of sleep. Set on the journey and explore dozens of locations; forest, old temples, forgotten villages and much more. Use your surviving skills and techniques to escape the inevitable in this thrilling hidden object puzzle adventure game! FIND your way out of the dark forest of Amazon INVESTIGATE mysterious and unusual locations FIND useful hidden objects SEARCH through dozens of hidden and sacred places HELP people of Amazon to stop the darkness SOLVE dozens of exciting mini-games WIN achievements READ the diary as your ADVENTURE continues
